headline.main: THE PUBLIC SCHOOL EXHIBITION.; Interesting Scene at the Cooper Institute-Large Attendance of Children-Speech of Peter Cooper.

docs.lead_paragraph: A grand reception was yesterday extended to Mr. PETER COOPER by the children and teachers of the public schools of the City at the Lecture-room of the Institute. The first three grammar classes of nearly all the schools were present, numbering about 3.000 scholars and teachers.

docs.snippet: THE NEW-YORK STATE ARSENAL.--So far as we are aware, there has been no inquiry into the causes of the recent falling of the roof of the new Arsenal in Seventh-avenue. Yet such an inquiry should be had, not only to fix the responsibility of that...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE NEW-YORK STATE ARSENAL.--So far as we are aware, there has been no inquiry into the causes of the recent falling of the roof of the new Arsenal in Seventh-avenue. Yet such an inquiry should be had, not only to fix the responsibility of that disaster where it belongs, but as a precaution for the future.

docs.lead_paragraph: THE HEALTH DEPARTMENT DIFFICULTY.--Judge EMOTT, of the Supreme Court, yesterday, in the case of Warren Cleaveland vs. The City of Brooklyn, rendered the following decision: " This case having been tried by me without a Jury, by the consent of the parties.

docs.snippet: To the Editor of the New-York Times: This is either a department of Public Health, or it is simply a branch of the Police Department, If its functions are of the forme. character, then It is imperative that its officers shall possess peculiar...

headline.main: The City Inspector's Department--What I Is and What It Should Be.

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New-York Times: This is either a department of Public Health, or it is simply a branch of the Police Department, If its functions are of the forme. character, then It is imperative that its officers shall possess peculiar qualifications to enable then to perform the duties pertainingto the officer, such qualifications can only be found in the thoroughly-educated scientific physician.

docs.snippet: REPUBLICAN CITY CONVENTION. A special meeting of the Republican City Convention was held last evening, at no. 618 Broadway, A?? F. Dow presided, and Messrs. BOYD and McFARLAND officiated as Secretaries. After the meeting had been called to order, the...
docs.lead_paragraph: REPUBLICAN CITY CONVENTION. A special meeting of the Republican City Convention was held last evening, at no. 618 Broadway, A?? F. Dow presided, and Messrs. BOYD and McFARLAND officiated as Secretaries. After the meeting had been called to order, the Chairman desired all present who were not members of the convention to retire.

headline.main: LATEST BY TELEGRAPH.; FROM THE PACIFIC. Arrival of the Overland California Mail. Later from Califoraia, Oregon, and Fraser's River.

headline.main: FROM KANSAS.; Disappearance of the Free-State Party--Political Movements--The Gold Excitement--Captain Montgomery--A Refuge from Justice in South Carolina.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Territorially Delegate Convention called by the Central Committee to assemble at this place on the 10th inst., for the purpose of considering the subjects of our admission into the Union, and of the future organization of parties in the Territory, was, from unavoidable causes, very thinly attended, and resulted in nothing.
